name: order-book
description: Fetches real-time order book depth data from Binance perpetual futures. Output includes bid orders (buy orders at various price levels) and ask orders (sell orders at various price levels). Each level contains price and quantity. The order book provides insight into market depth, supply and demand levels, and potential support/resistance zones. Useful for identifying liquidity concentrations, market making strategies, and short-term price movements. Data is returned in compact CSV format with abbreviated column names for efficiency.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of price levels to return. Options: 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 500, or 1000
